Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at Jeffery/93rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump & 15 Jeffery Local  buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 95th, Colfax, 95th, and Jeffery due to, street blockage near Jeffery/93rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jeffery, 95th, Colfax, 95th, and Jeffery due to, street blockage near Jeffery/93rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Damen and Racine
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Racine due to unauthorized person on the tracks at LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Racine due to unauthorized person on the tracks at LaSalle.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Damen, and,
  • between Racine and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Damen and Racine to provide connecting service.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
